messages.message: 'bodyMetrics' is assigned a value but never used. Allowed unused vars must match /^[A-Z_]/u.
React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency: 'student'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [student.height, student.birthDate, student.birth_date, student]
